Pastor Steve Jeffery gives a brief look at eschatology and its effects on our theology. What is eschatology? What is eschatology’s impact on the rest of our thinking about history? Views of the Millennium (Revelation 20) God’s plan for Man Dominion and the end of history Arguments from the Bible Visit our website: https://www.allsaintskirk.com Worship […]
